title: What were the Mutua Madrid Open results?
description: The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open continued on Thursday, when Jack Draper secured his place in the Top 5 with a quarter-final win. Casper Ruud claimed his first Lexus ATP Head2Head win against Daniil Medvedev. Francisco Cerundolo overcame Jakub Mensik and Lorenzo Musetti also advanced. View all the Madrid results from Thursday below. Madrid

Draper, Musetti, Ruud & Cerundolo reach semis

May 01, 2025

Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour

The Mutua Madrid Open is the fourth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open continued on Thursday, when Jack Draper secured his place in the Top 5 with a quarter-final win. Casper Ruud claimed his first Lexus ATP Head2Head win against Daniil Medvedev. Francisco Cerundolo overcame Jakub Mensik and Lorenzo Musetti also advanced.

View all the Madrid results from Thursday below.

Results - Thursday, 01 May 2025
Men's Singles - Quarterfinal
ATP - [14] Casper Ruud (NOR) d [9] Daniil Medvedev 63 75
ATP - [10] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) d [LL] Gabriel Diallo (CAN) 64 63
ATP - [20] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) d [22] Jakub Mensik (CZE) 36 76(5) 62
ATP - [5] Jack Draper (GBR) d Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) 60 64

Men's Doubles - Quarterfinal
ATP - [5] Marcel Granollers (ESP)/Horacio Zeballos (ARG) d [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN)/Henry Patten (GBR) 76(3) 63
ATP - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA)/Mate Pavic (CRO) d [6] Nikola Mektic (CRO)/Michael Venus (NZL) 67(5) 64 10-5
ATP - [3] Kevin Krawietz (GER)/Tim Puetz (GER) d Sander Gille (BEL)/Jan Zielinski (POL) 63 64
ATP - Christian Harrison (USA)/Evan King (USA) d Maximo Gonzalez (ARG)/Andres Molteni (ARG) 64 62
